customer_name: HOPE FARMS AT DISCO BAY, LLC
site_name: HOPE FARMS AT DISCO BAY, LLC

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The most recent program review and facility inspection occurred over 9 months ago on June 28, 2023. The regulations
require the IACUC to review the research facility's program for the humane care and use of animals and to inspect the
animal facility at least once every six months.
These evaluations are necessary to ensure appropriate oversight of the care and use of animals by the IACUC. The
research facility must ensure these evaluations are conducted at least once every 6 months.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)  Repeat
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The most recent program review and facility inspection occurred over 9 months ago on June 28, 2023. The regulations 
require the IACUC to review the research facility's program for the humane care and use of animals and to inspect the 
animal facility at least once every six months.  
 
These evaluations are necessary to ensure appropriate oversight of the care and use of animals by the IACUC. The 
research facility must ensure these evaluations are conducted at least once every 6 months. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
